chunks: CodeIQ: An Agentic AI System for Automated, Context-Aware Code Documentation Riya Indap 21 Sachi Jadhav 22 Durva Kadam 23 Shruti Kadam 24 Date of presentation: 25th July 2025 Under the guidance of: St. Francis Institute of Technology Department of Information Technology Content Introduction ● Review of literature ● Problem definition & Proposed solution ● Scope of project ● Architecture or block diagram (broader ● topic/algorithm) Explanation of individual blocks (if exists) or algorithm ○ Hardware/ software requirement ● Literature Cited (book, web & paper References) ● 2 SFIT- IT department CodeIQ: An Agentic AI System for Automated,Context-Aware Code Documentation Introduction ❖ How can we automatically create accurate, role-specific code documentation that stays up to date and reflects real code behavior? As codebases grow and change, manual documentation becomes impractical. CodeIQ is an Agentic AI System that automates the documentation process by analyzing code, adapting to chan

ges in the codebase and presenting information in a way that's easier to understand for different types of users — all with minimal manual effort. 3 SFIT- IT department CodeIQ: An Agentic AI System for Automated,Context-Aware Code Documentation Need of the Project 1. In modern software development, high-quality documentation is crucial for maintainability, collaboration, and developer onboarding. 2. Evolving software projects often suffer from outdated or missing documentation, making the code hard to understand, debug, and maintain. 3. As software systems grow in size and complexity, maintaining up-to-date documentation becomes increasingly difficult. 4. There is a growing need for intelligent, role-specific, automated systems that can generate and maintain documentation contextually and dynamically. 4 SFIT- IT department CodeIQ: An Agentic AI System for Automated,Context-Aware Code Documentation Review of literature Sr. Title of Methodology Analysis/Limitation No paper 1. Combining ●

Prompts:Fed code ● lacks evaluation of Contexts snippets to GPT-3 Codex factual accuracy in from using either zero-shot or generated Multiple one-short learning. documentation. Example ● Evaluation: Assessed Generation output using BLEU scores and qualitative metrics like readability and informativeness. 5 SFIT- IT department CodeIQ: An Agentic AI System for Automated,Context-Aware Code Documentation Review of literature Sr. Title of Methodology Analysis/Limitation No paper 2. Learning to ● Hybrid Context: Combines ● Uses a single Generate code, class, doc, and call model (either Structured info—covers 70%+ of summary LLM-based or Code tokens. lightweight) for all Summaries ● Multi-Task Learning: documentation From Separately generates function, tasks. Hybrid param, return, and usage docs. ● Ignores broader

Code ● Dual Models: Uses Code Llama program context, Context (7B) and fast LSTM (44M, 286× making it hard to faster). predict keywords ● Javadoc Output: Generates full beyond the target tagged Javadoc; uses PageRank method. for usage info. 6 SFIT- IT department CodeIQ: An Agentic AI System for Automated,Context-Aware Code Documentation Review of literature Sr. Title of Methodology Analysis/Limitation No paper 3. AI Based ● Chunking: Splits ● Static Analysis Code and summarizes Only-The system does Documentati code hierarchically. not consider how the on ● Dependencies: code behaves during Generation Resolves imports to execution document modules ● The system generates in order. external documentation ● Multi-language: but lacks integration of Parses Python, Java, inline docstrings C++, and JS with directly within the language- specific source code. tools 7 SFIT- IT department CodeIQ: An Agentic AI System for Automated,Context-Aware Code Documentation Review of literature Sr. Title of p

aper Methodology Analysis/Limitation No 4. DocAgent: A ● Chunking: Parses ● Static Analysis Only: Multi-Agent code into units; DocAgent does not System for summarizes and execute code, so it can Automated combines. miss runtime behavior Code ● Dependencies: and dynamic context. Documentati Resolves imports; ● Role-based on documents in documentation Generation dependency order. ● LLM Docs: Generates structured docs using optimized LLM prompts. 8 SFIT- IT department CodeIQ: An Agentic AI System for Automated,Context-Aware Code Documentation Problem definition & Proposed solution ❖ Problem Definition To address the lack of accurate and context-aware code documentation by building an Agentic AI system that mimics human reasoning reading, retrieving, generating, and verifying documentation through collaborative agents that adapt to code context, history, and semantics across large, evolving codebases. The system incorporates runtime-aware validation to ensure documentation reflects actual

behavior, and generates role-specific documentation for improved usability and relevance. 9 SFIT- IT department CodeIQ: An Agentic AI System for Automated,Context-Aware Code Documentation Problem definition & Proposed solution ❖ Proposed Solution We propose a modular, multi-agent framework that automates Python code documentation with enhanced accuracy, adaptability, and role-awareness. Introduces runtime-aware documentation by analyzing function ⚫ behavior through controlled execution traces. Ensures factual correctness using a hybrid verifier that combines static ⚫ validation with dynamic trace matching. Customizes documentation output for different roles (developer, tester, ⚫ DevOps) through a role-semantic docstring generator. Tracks and adapts to codebase changes via a Git-integrated history-aware ⚫ Searcher Agent. Produces structured, versioned, and readable documentation using a ⚫ coordinated writer and orchestration workflow. 10 Scope of project Language Focus The system will b

e designed specifically for Python repositories only. Code Analysis We will use both static analysis (AST-based) and dynamic verification (runtime behavior) to ensure documentation accuracy. Web Application A web app that will allow users to upload Python code, trigger analysis, and view generated documentation. Visual The interface will display AST trees & dependency DAGs to Representations help users visualize the structure and flow of code. Docstring Format The system will generate docstrings in Google-style format, following a clean and standardized documentation pattern. Repository-Level The system will automatically generate README.md, Docs module-level summaries, and other high-level documentation files. 11 SFIT- IT department CodeIQ: An Agentic AI System for Automated,Context-Aware Code Documentation Architecture or block diagram 12 SFIT- IT department CodeIQ: An Agentic AI System for Automated,Context-Aware Code Documentation 13 Software requirements Category Software/Tool Ver

sion Control Git, GitPython IDE / Editor VS Code / PyCharm Operating System Windows 11 / Ubuntu 20.04+ Programming Language Python Hardware requirements Component Minimum Specification Processor Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 RAM 8/16 GB Storage 256 GB HDD/SSD Internet Required for LLM API access 14 SFIT- IT department CodeIQ: An Agentic AI System for Automated,Context-Aware Code Documentation Literature Cited [1] D. Yang, A. Simoulin, X. Qian, X. Liu, Y. Cao, Z. Teng, and G. Yang, “DocAgent: A Multi-Agent System for Automated Code Documentation Generation,” arXiv preprint, arXiv:2504.08725, Apr. 2025. [Online]. [2] K. S. Pawar, A. S. Bhosale, A. G. Mahajan, A. V. Ulagadde, and M. Mane, “AI-Based Code Documentation Generation,” International Journal of Innovative Research in Technology (IJIRT), vol. 11, no. 9, pp. 411–414, 2024. [Online]. [3] J. Y. Khan and G. Uddin, “Combining Contexts from Multiple Sources for Documentation-Specific Code Example Generation,” in Proceedings of the 37th I

EEE/ACM International Conference on Automated Software Engineering (ASE '22), Rochester, MI, USA, Oct. 2022. [4]Ziyi Zhou , Mingchen Li , Huiqun Yu , Senior Member, IEEE, Guisheng Fan , Penghui Yang ,and Zijie Huang, “Learning to Generate Structured Code Summaries From Hybrid Code Context,” IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON SOFTWARE ENGINEERING, VOL. 50, NO. 10, OCTOBER 2024 15 SFIT- IT department CodeIQ: An Agentic AI System for Automated,Context-Aware Code Documentation Thank You! 16 SFIT- IT department CodeIQ: An Agentic AI System for Automated,Context-Aware Code Documentation

Introduces runtime-aware documentation by analyzing function ⚫ behavior through controlled execution traces. Tracks and adapts to codebase changes via a Git-integrated history-aware ⚫ Searcher Agent.
